o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_TargetAttributeEdit
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) ' Store a reference to the target entity so we can open an object picker on it's attributes. Dim objTargetEntity : Set objTargetEntity = obj.ParentObject.Classifier
' Show an object picker on the target entity attributes. Dim objSelAttribute : Set objSelAttribute = SelectAnyAttribute(objTargetEntity)
' If an attribute was chosen, store it. If Not(objSelAttribute Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_TargetAttribute", objSelAttribute End If End Sub
